item.description:
New venue this time to make room for more -- lots of room now.

This is the Boston University Biology Building, room 113

If taking the T: Green B Line Blanford St. stop: Cross over Comm Ave towards Metcalf Science Bldg.
Hook right onto Cummington St., look for Nr. 5 (biology)

See you there
Sean
item.how_to_find_us: Enter 5 Cummington entrance, take immediate left, take right.

group.name: The Boston Philosophy of Mind Group

item.name: Unity of Consciousness: Nigel presents a neuroscientist's perspective
